argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fdmfisuppfi.f | |- ( ph -> F : D --> R ) |
| 2 |  | fdmfisuppfi.d | |- ( ph -> D e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | fdmfisuppfi.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ffun | |- ( F : D --> R -> Fun F ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Fun F ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_fdmfisuppfi | |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( F : D --> R -> F Fn D ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F Fn D ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( F Fn D /\ D e. Fin ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 10 | 8, 2, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_isfsupp | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ Z e. V ) -> ( F finSupp Z <-> ( Fun F /\ ( F supp Z ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 3, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( F finSupp Z <-> ( Fun F /\ ( F supp Z ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 6, 12 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ph -> F finSupp Z ) |
